name: 張賢廷
objective:
本課程以 Python 物件導向程式撰寫為出發，輔以要求學生開發各類型之應用來熟悉 Python 物件導向程式之特點，並且教導學生使用各類型之應用函式庫來讓學生更加熟悉 Python 之特性，並應用於人工智慧、影像處理與網頁資料抓取… 等應用。
Students in this course will begin by writing Python object-oriented programs, followed by developing various types of applications to familiarize themselves with Python object-oriented programs, and are instructed to utilize various application libraries to get acquainted with Python features and to apply them to applications such as artificial intelligence, image processing, web data crawling, etc.
schedule:
課程內容將根據實際情況適當調整
The content of the course will be adjusted appropriately according to the actual situation

Week 01	Introduction & Instruction of Python tools
Week 02	Preliminary Mathematics Review
Week 03	Regression Analysis
Week 04	MCP Neuron & Adaline
Week 05	Bayesian Decision Theory
Week 06	Logistic regression
Week 07	Support Vector Machine & Kernel trick
Week 08	KNN
Week 09	Decision Tree
Week 10	Dimensionality Reduction
Week 11	Performance evaluating
Week 12	Hyper-parameter adjusting
Week 13	Clustering Analysis
Week 14	Pathing Planning
Week 15	Convolutional Neural Networks, CNN
Week 16	Recurrent Neural Networks, RNN
Week 17	Implementation of  YOLO & AlphaPose
Week 18	Final exam
